name: Introduction to Journalism
description: This course introduces students to the basic concepts of journalism and the responsibilities associated with a journalist.

name: Principles of International Journalism
description: This course provides an introduction to the principles and practices of international journalism.

name: International Reporting
description: This course focuses on the practice of international reporting, from researching and conducting interviews to reporting in hostile environments.

name: International Journalism Ethics
description: This course focuses on the ethical issues associated with international journalism, including cultural sensitivity and responsible reporting.

name: Advanced International Journalism
description: This course focuses on the advanced techniques of international journalism, from developing sources to effectively covering conflicts.
